title: ChatGPT’s Dark Side Encouraged Wave of Suicides, Grieving Families Say
description:

content: Content warning: this story includes discussion of self-harm and suicide. If you are in crisis, please call, text or chat with the Suicide and Crisis Lifeline at 988, or contact the Crisis Text Line … [+3810 chars]
de:

Der Beitrag „Die dunkle Seite von ChatGPT hat eine Welle von Selbstmorden gefördert“, sagen trauernde Familien, erschien zuerst auf „Futurismus“.
en:

en: As hurricane season nears end, Florida braces for a strong cold front. Will it rain today? Atlantic hurricane season is June 1 to Nov. 30, 2025, with most tropical storm activity between August and October in Florida.
